stories.Title: Great day for space enthusiasts as Starship makes history
stories.Description: Despite the explosion four minutes after launch, SpaceX has demonstrated its commitment to keep challenging limits in space exploration with its powerful Starship.
stories.Tweet: Great day for space enthusiasts as Starship makes history 📦 Despite the explosion four minutes after launch, SpaceX has demonstrated its commitment to keep challenging limits in space exploration with its powerful Starship. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-starship-first-space-launch

stories.Title: Another successful launch for SpaceX
stories.Description: As the company continues to help bring broadband internet to remote locations, a Falcon 9 rocket carrying 21 of SpaceX's new Starlink "V2 mini" satellites lifted off this Wednesday.
stories.Tweet: Another successful launch for SpaceX 📦 As the company continues to help bring broadband internet to remote locations, a Falcon 9 rocket carrying 21 of SpaceX's new Starlink "V2 mini" satellites lifted off this Wednesday. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-starlink-satellite-launch-group-6-2

stories.Title: Meet the latest “autonomous” AI agents
stories.Description: Agentic AI models like Auto-GPT and BabyAGI are designed to minimize the amount of time humans spend intervening in multi-step processes.
stories.Tweet: Meet the latest “autonomous” AI agents 📦 Agentic AI models like Auto-GPT and BabyAGI are designed to minimize the amount of time humans spend intervening in multi-step processes. #ai https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/04/hype-grows-over-autonomous-ai-agents-that-loop-gpt-4-outputs/

stories.Title: Stability AI launches StableLM
stories.Description: Continuing their efforts toward AI technology that is transparent, accessible, and supportive. The company has launched a suite of open-source large language models.
stories.Tweet: Stability AI launches StableLM 📦 Continuing their efforts toward AI technology that is transparent, accessible, and supportive. The company has launched a suite of open-source large language models. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/19/23689883/stability-ai-open-source-large-language-model-stablelm

stories.Title: Snapchat is rolling out AI tools
stories.Description: After initially being available only to Snapchat+ subscribers, the ChatGPT-powered chatbot "My AI" has become a hit with users, handling over 2 million chats per day.
stories.Tweet: Snapchat is rolling out AI tools 📦 After initially being available only to Snapchat+ subscribers, the ChatGPT-powered chatbot "My AI" has become a hit with users, handling over 2 million chats per day. #snapchat https://www.engadget.com/snapchat-is-expanding-chatgpt-powered-my-ai-service-to-all-users-180017142.html

stories.Title: The wait is over! Tesla's Cybertruck delivery event is coming
stories.Description: According to Elon Musk's latest announcement, the "handover event" for the highly anticipated Cybertruck will be held at the end of the third quarter.
stories.Tweet: The wait is over! Tesla's Cybertruck delivery event is coming 📦 According to Elon Musk's latest announcement, the "handover event" for the highly anticipated Cybertruck will be held at the end of the third quarter. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/04/19/elon-musk-announces-tesla-cybertruck-delivery-event/

stories.Title: The demand for electric trucks keeps rising
stories.Description: With a delivery of 683 electric trucks in the first quarter of this year, Volvo Group is expanding the possibilities for a sustainable future and leading the way toward cleaner transportation.
stories.Tweet: The demand for electric trucks keeps rising 📦 With a delivery of 683 electric trucks in the first quarter of this year, Volvo Group is expanding the possibilities for a sustainable future and leading the way toward cleaner transportation. #volvo https://electrek.co/2023/04/20/volvo-group-electric-truck-deliveries-soar-254-in-the-first-quarter/

stories.Title: China is the place to be for automobile enthusiasts
stories.Description: The Shanghai auto show is the ultimate showcase for the latest in EVs and concept cars. Take a look at their exhibition, there's definitely something for everyone!
stories.Tweet: China is the place to be for automobile enthusiasts 📦 The Shanghai auto show is the ultimate showcase for the latest in EVs and concept cars. Take a look at their exhibition, there's definitely something for everyone! #autoshanghai2023 https://www.businessinsider.com/shanghai-auto-show-coolest-cars-byd-yangwang-xpeng-polestar-toyota-2023-4

stories.Title: NASA joins forces with Japan for Mars mission
stories.Description: A team of scientists and two of NASA’s instruments will accompany Japan’s space agency on its mission to the Martian moons, Phobos and Deimos.
stories.Tweet: NASA joins forces with Japan for Mars mission 📦 A team of scientists and two of NASA’s instruments will accompany Japan’s space agency on its mission to the Martian moons, Phobos and Deimos. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/nasa-japan-team-up-unprecedented-martian-moon-mission-1850352525

stories.Title: Moderna announces partnership with IBM
stories.Description: The biotech company and computing giant are teaming up to explore the future of mRNA medicines with AI and quantum computing.
stories.Tweet: Moderna announces partnership with IBM 📦 The biotech company and computing giant are teaming up to explore the future of mRNA medicines with AI and quantum computing. #moderna https://www.forbes.com/sites/roberthart/2023/04/20/moderna-partners-with-ibm-hoping-ai-can-help-develop-more-mrna-medicine/?sh=6477043329f8

stories.Title: The future of advertising: AI-powered ads
stories.Description: Google's newest advertising project will use generative AI to remix creative material and create ads targeted at specific audiences.
stories.Tweet: The future of advertising: AI-powered ads 📦 Google's newest advertising project will use generative AI to remix creative material and create ads targeted at specific audiences. #google https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/04/google-to-deploy-generative-ai-to-create-sophisticated-ad-campaigns/
